name: Gmail Planets old-school
description:
This is an attempt to get back some of the old look for gmail specifically for the planets theme, including:
old-style compose (Note: you need to switch it to full-screen compose for this to work.)
old-style reply
old-style look

Does not fix the icons, but I find in smaller buttons they don't bother me as much.
additional_info:
-Fix Aug 27
Fixed an issue with the search drop-down having a transparent background.

-Fix Sep 4
Fixed the white space under the bottom bar (and an issue where text was hidden).

-Fix Oct 23
gmail apparently changed a couple things which messed up the compose.  Fixed both the full-screen and small versions.

-Fix Nov 5
Fixed the show details pop-up to be dark background to work with the white text.  Minor alteration to background to make e-mail titles clearer.  change .AO to transparent to revert.

-Fix April 1
gmail changed a bunch of stuff recently that totally screwed up the full-screen compose.  Fixed those issues.
